alert.note: Alert for Broadwater (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 13 at 7:41PM MDT until June 16 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Montana... Missouri River at DCP-Toston affecting Broadwater County. For the Missouri River...including DCP-Toston...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Missouri River at DCP-Toston. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Low lying fields flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM MDT Monday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Tuesday morning at 1000 AM MDT.
